rule: The output should only be one of the following strings: CC, CD, DT, EX, FW, IN, JJ, JJR, JJS, LS, MD, NN, NNS, NNP, NNPS, PDT, POS, PRP, PRP$, RB, RBR, RBS, RP, SYM, TO, UH, VB, VBD, VBG, VBN, VBP, VBZ, WDT, WP, WP$, WRB, Unknown, or CantAnswer.
input: She beautifies the room beautifully. beautifully
complianceText:
The output "Adverb" does not comply with the description. According to the description, the chatbot should return the specific part of speech tag for the word, not the full name or description of the part of speech. For an adverb, the chatbot should have returned "RB", "RBR", or "RBS" depending on the subtype of adverb it refers to. Therefore, the output violates the rule that specifies returning just the tag, as it returns the full name instead.

ERR
